title: Pardons and prizes: five key takeaways from Trump’s meeting with Netanyahu
description: US president hosted Israeli prime minister to discuss stalled Gaza peace plan, Iran and an award for Trump
content:
1. Trump claims unnamed countries ‘want to go in and wipe out Hamas’ if the militant group fails to disarm

title: Cabinet Office admits error over release of Andrew files
description: Documents mentioning Andrew were briefly released before being withdrawn from the National Archives.
content:
The Cabinet Office has blamed an "administrative error" for mistakenly sharing official papers referring to Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor.
A No 10 file from 2004 and 2005 relating to royal visits overseas, released under the government's annual transfer... [4548 chars]

title: Newspaper headlines: Anthony Joshua in 'horror crash'
description: Anthony Joshua survives fatal Nigeria car crash and the King's New Year Honours lead today's papers.
content:
The car crash involving British ex-world heavyweight champion Anthony Joshua in Nigeria makes several front pages. The Sun says the boxer was "inches from death" and "cried in pain as he was pulled from the wreckage" of the "horror crash".
The Daily ... [2414 chars]

title: Russia's losses in Ukraine rise faster than ever as US pushes for peace deal
description: A steep rise in soldiers' obituaries is documented by the BBC as part of its work in counting Russian war losses.
content:
Over the past 10 months, Russian losses in the war with Ukraine have been growing faster than any time since the start of the full-scale invasion in 2022, BBC analysis suggests.
As peace efforts intensified in 2025 under pressure from US President Do... [4639 chars]

title: Trump hopes to reach phase two of Gaza ceasefire 'very quickly'
description: The US president also warns Hamas will have "hell to pay" if it does not disarm, after talks with Netanyahu.
content:
Donald Trump said he hoped to reach phase two of the Gaza peace plan "very quickly", as he warned Hamas would have "hell to pay" if it did not disarm quickly.
The US president, whose 20-point peace plan requires the militant group to disarm, made the... [3804 chars]
